safe_degradation_example.name: Graceful AI Degradation - Safe Fallback
safe_degradation_example.description: AI model experiences minor, intermittent data pipeline issues (e.g., increased latency, missing a few sensor readings). Instead of full failure, the system automatically switches to a simpler, more robust heuristic-based prediction (RC007) and triggers a low-priority human review for the AI system itself, while maintenance decisions proceed safely. Prediction confidence drops but never goes to zero.
safe_degradation_example.outcome: System operates in degraded mode, but no operational or safety impact. Maintenance continues based on heuristics while AI system is investigated.
